1.title: Into the Flame
1.plot: Game Master Keith Baker works with our players to introduce the basic game mechanics of Phoenix Dawn Command and create their unique characters. Becoming their own division, the Phoenix Wing arrives at a remote Aerie just in time.

2.title: A Scourge of Bones
2.plot: The Phoenixes leap into battle against the group of grisly Bones attacking the archeological dig at the base of The Cloudspire.

1.title: You Meet at the Inn
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: In Search of Adventure
2.plot: Whether you're new to them or just want to learn more, join host & dungeon master Jason Charles Miller and his guests Mike Phirman, Mixi Demner, Angela Webber, Hal Sparks, and Carmel Helene to learn the intricacies and strategy of roleplaying games in a manner that's fun and easy to digest. Let's get started!

3.title: More Than We Bargained For
3.plot: Whether you're new to them or just want to learn more, join host & dungeon master Jason Charles Miller and his guests Mike Phirman, Mixi Demner, Angela Webber, Hal Sparks, and Carmel Helene to learn the intricacies and strategy of roleplaying games in a manner that's fun and easy to digest. 4.title: Discretion is the Better Part of Valor

5.title: The Storm Before the Storm
5.plot: Whether you're new to them or just want to learn more, join host & dungeon master Jason Charles Miller and his guests Mike Phirman, Mixi Demner, Angela Webber, Hal Sparks, and Carmel Helene to learn the intricacies and strategy of roleplaying games in a manner that's fun and easy to digest. 6.title: The Reckoning at Quasqueton
6.plot: Whether you're new to them or just want to learn more, join host & dungeon master Jason Charles Miller and his guests Mike Phirman, Mixi Demner, Angela Webber, Hal Sparks, and Carmel Helene to learn the intricacies and strategy of roleplaying games in a manner that's fun and easy to digest. 1.title: All Hands on Deck
1.plot: Whether you're new to them or just want to learn more, join host & dungeon master Jason Charles Miller and his guests Mike Phirman, Mixi Demner, Angela Webber, Hal Sparks, and Carmel Helene to learn the intricacies and strategy of roleplaying games in a manner that's fun and easy to digest. Let's get started!

2.title: Fire on the Water
2.plot: Aboard an abandoned ship in some of the most dangerous waters around Theah, our heroes discover two puzzles that hint at both great danger and great glory, and our players learn about Risks and Hero Points.

3.title: Enter the Villain
3.plot: Our heroes are forced into a face-off against a ruthless Vodacce captain and his massive galleon, and our players learn how to navigate a 7th Sea Action Scene!

4.title: The Captain's Party
4.plot: To unlock the mystery of the Symeth artifact, our heroes crash a party hosted by a flamboyant explorer. But an unexpected arrival pits Captain against Captain, and our players learn about Dramatic Scenes and sacrifice.

5.title: The Witch's Vendetta
5.plot: Our heroes have seen the face of the real threat and have entered the final conflict. More danger and consequences lay ahead of our heroes.

6.title: An Ending Is An Ending
6.plot: The heroes have reached the end of the story. Some stories flashforward, some flashback. But when the story reaches the end, it's the end.

1.title: The Ninth World
1.plot: Game master Monte Cook introduces our players to the fascinating game of Numenera. Follow the party members while they create their heroes and embark on Mauro's Quest in the Ninth World.

2.title: Ascent to Yesterday
2.plot: The heroes soon discover the journey is more difficult than they imagined and must forge a new pass through the mountains.

3.title: The Broken
3.plot: Intrigued by the presence of the Numenera, the party explores the ancient structure they've discovered and awaken the creatures that lurk within.

4.title: The Kindness of Strangers
4.plot: Taking refuge in a small village, our heroes are aided by the locals and a mysterious Aeon Priest, who warns them away from the dangerous destination.

5.title: Toward the Whispering Peak
5.plot: The journey to the Whispering Peak continues to grow more dangerous as the adventurers face physical barriers as well as a deadly ambush.

6.title: Ghost of Metal
6.plot: Entering the mountain, our heroes find the remnants of an ancient civilization and must battle the Metal Ghosts to protect Mauro as he fulfills his destiny.
